description.name: Skrill 1-Tap
description.tagline: Accept payments online supporting a wide range of industries.
description.long:
Skrill's payment network provides more than 100 payment options, with 40 currencies covering 200 countries and territories.

[Click to learn more and signup](http://go.whmcs.com/558/skrill-signup)
features: Accept all major credit cards directly on your site
